adviseScripts.text: Welcome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Shall we start the concert?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You mean counseling?
... Right. Let's start the show.
Oh, r-right! Counseling.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: That's what I meant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I simply wanted to test you,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: and you passed. Congratulations.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Very well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Hmm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Why do you have your eyes closed?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Isn't this the part where we talk to each other?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I have my eyes closed so I can focus on the concert that's about to start.
I go over what counseling is with Crown in great detail.
Regardless of how long it takes,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I will make sure that all the wishes of my people are fulfilled.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: And what's your wish, Crown?
Is that your wish? Incredible.
I don't have one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Why not?
If I had a wish,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: then I would be consumed by the desire to fulfill it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You praise me excessively.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: But yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: That is my wish.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I talk more about wishes.
I heard that you have many Nikkes in your care.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: What is your reason for doing so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps it's the same reason that you take care of your subjects.
I enjoy it.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Then, you must continue caring for them
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: as you have done until now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: That's not the explanation I was expecting. However...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You must always be a support in the storm for them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Do you mean "port in the storm"?
Ah, yes. That's it... hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Amidst awkward laughter, Crowd quickly excuses herself.
Once we have shown you the way,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: you, Chime, and I must return to the Crown Kingdom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, but you two will have to head back without me.
It's a pity I can't join you.
... I can sense no hesitation in your voice, nor any hint of regret.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Very well. For now, Chime and I will be the only two returning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You, however, will remain as one of our citizens, so we will continue to keep watch over you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Very good. That is the answer I was looking for.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: However, do not be upset.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You can join us anytime, should you wish.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Always. Never forget that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: All of us speculate about when Crown might return to the kingdom.
What kind of person is Marian
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: when she's with you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Innocent and pure.
Kind and warm-hearted.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: In fact, that was the feeling I got when I first met her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: However, that has changed somewhat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Very much like she is now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: She takes good care of those around her and is very understanding.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: ... She's the same to everyone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown smiles bitterly.
Is there anything you would like to know about the Crown Kingdom?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: How did you become the king?
What is this treasure that you're guarding?
One of the citizens wished for me to become king,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: and so I had to accommodate them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It is the king's duty to fulfill the wishes of the people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It always has been this way and will continue to be so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: As I told you before,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: that is a secret.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: However, should you come and visit the kingdom yourself,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I will make sure that you find the answer to this question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I continue to ask various questions about the Crown Kingdom.
What do you think
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: a king's purpose is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: To lead the country as the citizens see fit.
To lead the country as you see fit.
Yes,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: a king always leads the way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: They must be a guiding light for their people, a beacon to turn to in times of darkness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: This is something that I always keep in mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... it seems you have a different perspective than me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: If the people's opinions are not taken into account,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: how can that be called leading a nation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I deliberate on what it means to be a king.
The population of our kingdom has reached 50 people,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: and so the responsibility weighs ever heavier on my head.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Wow, that's a lot.
That seems difficult to handle alone.
It's not a lot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: These numbers will only increase going forward.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Who's to say you won't also count yourself among the kingdom's subjects in due time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It is not difficult at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It is to be expected for a king to be responsible for their subjects.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You look worried.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Are you concerned for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You are a kind person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown smiles warmly.
Allow me to be straight with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Do you have no intention of coming to the kingdom with us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Straightly?
I'm sorry, but I don't.
I think you meant "straight".
Ah, yes. Right. That.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Well? What is your answer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Forget it. You don't need to answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Your expression says it all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It is disappointing, but there is nothing we can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You have said to yourself that you also have something you wish to protect,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: and I must respect that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: As soon as our conversation ends, Crown leaves to go find Chime.
I'm curious...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: What kind of food is popular in the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Gummy worms are pretty popular these days.
You're always spoiled for dessert choices in the Ark.
Gummy worms are actually popular in the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: So that's why Marian is such a fan of worms.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: They're not real worms... they're just worm-shaped candies.
I suppose that makes sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Chime once made me a dessert that's sold in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Its beauty was so great that I almost felt bad eating it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: If I ever have the chance, I would love to taste it again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I discuss the food in the Ark.
Lovely weather we're having.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: What kind of weather do you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Clear and sunny weather.
Cool and refreshing rainy weather.
That's my personal preference as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: When it's clear outside, you can see far off into the distance even when you're standing still.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It allows you to locate all sorts of objects,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: which makes our job much easier.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer rainy weather?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Certainly, rain is a wonderful thing that nourishes the land,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: but if it pours incessantly for days on end,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: it is not good for our castle in many ways.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I lay down side-by-side with Crown as we both bask in the sun.
Even though she's not here right now,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I always feel so safe and secure when Chime is at my side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure she feels the same way about you.
Hard to imagine someone like Chime will give you a sense of security.
That's right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I know it without her ever having to say anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: She is one of this kingdom's most precious citizens.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: She makes me feel perfectly secure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Although combat isn't her area of expertise,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: she excels in many other areas.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I discuss Chime's abilities.
Crown looks off into the distance, lost in thought.
Talk to her.
Don't say anything and wait.
Oh, hello.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I was just pondering the future of the kingdom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Soon after.
Were you waiting for me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You're such a thoughtful person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I spend some peaceful time with Crown.
So this is Splendamin?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: What does it taste like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: ... Maybe you should wipe the drool from your mouth.
Would you like to try some?
*Wipe wipe*
I-I'm not drooling!
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It's not me, first of all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: If you're offering, I won't refuse.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: *Munch*
So this is what Splendamin tastes like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I share my Splendamin with Crown.
What are you doing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Oh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You were using your phone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I can feel Crown staring me down, which is unnerving.
Is this interesting to you?
Do you mind? You're staring.
Very.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It's been a while since I've seen someone use a phone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I find it fascinating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Can you show me more?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I'm sorry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It's just been a while since I used a phone, so I was curious how they work nowadays.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I show Crown the various features of my phone.
Have you seen Chime, by any chance?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I haven't seen her for a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Maybe she went out for a walk.
Maybe she went out to scout the surroundings.
No, she's been gone too long for that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Plus, she would have said something to me beforehand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Oh, that could be it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Seeing as she left without saying anything...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: All right, I'll wait for a while longer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I wait for Chime.
What do you think is the most important part
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: of leading a kingdom?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Comporting yourself like a true king.
Being wealthy and prosperous.
You have a similar mindset as me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I agree with that thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I will continue along the path I've chosen,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: to become a leader worthy of calling themselves a true king.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Do you mean "path"?
Ah, yes, that's it, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: While prosperity is indeed quite important,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: as one does not want the citizens to live impecuniously,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: there are other things which are far more important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I discuss the matters in a kingdom.
It seems you and the Counters share a strong bond,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: just like Chime and I.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I think the Counters and I might have a stronger connection.
I think you two may have an ever stronger connection.
Haha, I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you can say that with such confidence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I hope you continue to grow that bond.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: In my eyes, your bond seems no less strong than ours.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: You must have confidence in yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Crown and I discuss the bonds between us and others.
*Cough cough*
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Ugh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Are you feeling unwell?
Eat slowly, or else you're going to choke.
No, I'm fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: It's just that I have a weak constitution to begin with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for asking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: ... Sorry?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: *Cough*
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I didn't eat anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: *Cough cough*
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Thankfully, Crown's coughing soon subsides.
You said you live in a place called the Outpost, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I would be quite interested in seeing what such a kingdom looks like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: If you're curious, you can come visit anytime.
But it's not nearly as grand as your kingdom.
I appreciate the invitation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: If the opportunity arises,
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I will be sure to visit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I am well aware of its lack of grandeur.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: Anis and Neon have told me about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: They say that while it may not be opulent, it is a fine place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Crown

adviseScripts.text: I briefly tell Crown more about the Outpost.
